properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_TICKET ( FLIGHT , DEPARTURE_DATE , BOARDING_TIME , GATE , DESTINATION ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT FLIGHT , DEPARTURE_DATE , BOARDING_TIME , GATE , DESTINATION FROM TB_TICKET ORDER BY DEPARTURE_DATE
SELECT FLIGHT , PASS_NAME , SEAT , DEPARTURE_DATE , BOARDING_TIME , GATE , DESTINATION FROM TB_TICKET JOIN TB_PASSENGER USING (FLIGHT) WHERE PASS_NAME = ?
